original: gzung ba'i rnam pa ste /üîΩde dang 'khyud pa nyid kyi phyir //
analyzed: gzung ba'i rnam pa ste / de dang 'khyud pa nyid kyi phyir //
translated: the aspect of the object.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩji skad du /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to // ji skad du /
translated: It is so called because it embraces him.

original: mdor byas las /
analyzed: mdor byas las /
translated: As it is said in the Compendium of Practice:

original: rdor je sems pa'i dang 'khyud pa reg bya rdo rje ma ni gnas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rdor je sems pa'i dang 'khyud pa reg bya rdo rje ma ni gnas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The embrace of the mind of vajra is the place of Spar≈õavajrƒÅ.

original: de ltar rnam pa gnyis par tu byed pa dang bcas pa dag gis yul gyi rab tu dbye ba brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa gnyis par tu byed pa dang bcas pa dag gis yul gyi rab tu dbye ba brjod nas /
translated: Thus, having described the division of the objects by means of the two aspects and the two purities,üîΩnow the division of the objects by means of the four aspects is described.

original: nang gi bdag nyid kyi skye mched kyi dbye ba brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid kyi skye mched kyi dbye ba brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to explain the internal divisions of the sense-fields,

original: de'i yan lag mdor bstan pa /
analyzed: de'i yan lag mdor bstan pa /
translated: he states their brief summary:

original: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad ni //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad ni //
translated: The eight collections of consciousness

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so on.

original: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dbye pas so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dbye pas so //
translated: The six collections of consciousness, the afflicted mentality, and the fundamental consciousness are divided.

original: brten pa'i zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mig la sogs pa brgyad po rnams kyi brtan pa ste /
analyzed: brten pa'i zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mig la sogs pa brgyad po rnams kyi brtan pa ste /

original: rten zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rten zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,

original: mig la sogs pa dbang po la //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa dbang po la //
translated: he says, the eye, etc., the faculties,

original: zhes bya ba ni brgyad la brten pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni brgyad la brten pa'o //
translated: which are the eight bases.

original: de la brten nas rnam par shes pa tshogs brgyad kyi dngos po bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la brten nas rnam par shes pa tshogs brgyad kyi dngos po bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the eight collections of consciousness are generated in dependence on them.

original: byang chub sems dpa' bskyed du zhes bya ba ni sa'i snying po dang por byas nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bskyed du zhes bya ba ni sa'i snying po dang por byas nas /
translated: The bodhisattvas are generated means that the bodhisattvas are generated in dependence on the eight collections of consciousness.

original: kun du bzang po'i mthar thug pa rgyal ba'i sras kyi ngo bo rnams su shes par bya'o //
analyzed: kun du bzang po'i mthar thug pa rgyal ba'i sras kyi ngo bo rnams su shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that the ultimate of Samantabhadra is the nature of the Victor's sons.

original: de'i rnam par dag pa la brten nas phyin ci ma log pa'i dngos po'i rim pa zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i rim pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i rnam par dag pa la brten nas phyin ci ma log pa'i dngos po'i rim pa zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i rim pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Based on the purity of that, the so-called unmistaken stage of entities is the meaning of by the stage of the eye, etc.,

original: de ltar mdor bstan pa bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar mdor bstan pa bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the brief indication,

original: rgyas par brjod pa brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyas par brjod pa brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to express the extensive explanation,

original: de'i yan lag mig gi dbang po rnam par dag pa ni /
analyzed: de'i yan lag mig gi dbang po rnam par dag pa ni /
translated: the purity of the eye faculty, which is a branch of that,üîΩis stated:

original: mig gnyis sa yi snying por gsungs //
analyzed: mig gnyis sa yi snying por gsungs //
translated: The two eyes are said to be K·π£itigarbha.

original: zhes gsungs te mig gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes gsungs te mig gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The two eyes are the nature of the bodhisattva K·π£itigarbha.

original: de'i yul sa la sogs pa'i 'byung ba chen po skyed par byed cing /
analyzed: de'i yul sa la sogs pa'i 'byung ba chen po skyed par byed cing /
translated: The object of that generates the great elements such as earth,

original: rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid du rtog pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid du rtog pa'i phyir /
translated: and because of conceptualizing the characteristics of conceptuality,

original: byang chub sems pa'i zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems pa'i zhes bya ba ni /
translated: the bodhisattva

original: byang chub ni sku gsum gyi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: byang chub ni sku gsum gyi ngo bo ste /
translated: is the nature of the three kƒÅyas.

original: de la sems dpa' 'di la yod bas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la sems dpa' 'di la yod bas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It is called heroic mind because it exists in this [bodhisattva].

original: rmad du che zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa'i thabs kyis gzhan gyi don bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rmad du che zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa'i thabs kyis gzhan gyi don bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //

original: gzugs la sogs pa ci rigs par //üîΩzhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa ci rigs par // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In regard to form, etc., as appropriate.

original: gzugs la sog pa'i yul lnga rnams la yang kun nas ci rigs par ro //
analyzed: gzugs la sog pa'i yul lnga rnams la yang kun nas ci rigs par ro //

original: gzhan yang / rang gi ngo bo spro par byed //
analyzed: gzhan yang / rang gi ngo bo spro par byed //

analyzed: ces bya ba ni rang nyid kyi ngo bo ma skyes pa'i rnam par la spro ba byed pa'o //

original: de ltar mig gi dbang po rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar mig gi dbang po rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the purity of the eye faculty,

original: rna ba'i @158b dbang po rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rna ba'i @158b dbang po rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: for the sake of purifying the ear faculty,

analyzed: sgra'i rnam pa zhes bya ba la sog pa gsungs te /
translated: he speaks of the aspect of sound, etc.

original: sgra'i rnam pa pi spang la sogs pa'i dbye pas /
analyzed: sgra'i rnam pa pi spang la sogs pa'i dbye pas /

original: tha dad pa rnams kyi sgra'i rnam pa kun bcad pas /
analyzed: tha dad pa rnams kyi sgra'i rnam pa kun bcad pas /
translated: By eliminating all aspects of sound that are different,

original: tha mal ba'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su zin pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: tha mal ba'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su zin pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: it is the aspect that subsumes ordinary conceptualization.

original: de nyid ni dbye ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni dbye ba ste /
translated: That itself is the division,

original: khyad par la de dang de'i rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par la de dang de'i rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the antidote to the conceptualization of this and that particular.

original: de yongs su bsgoms pas rnam par dpyad pa'o //
analyzed: de yongs su bsgoms pas rnam par dpyad pa'o //

original: phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba ni sgra'i rnam par rtog pa la phyag na rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba ni sgra'i rnam par rtog pa la phyag na rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The vajra in the hand is the conceptualization of sound, because of realizing it as emptiness by the nature of VajrapƒÅ·πái.

original: yang dag bshad ces bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag bshad ces bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
translated: The correct explanation is the expression.

original: sgra yi rnam shes mtshan nyid ni //üîΩzhes bya ba ni sgra la gdod ma nas skye ba med pa nyid kyis shes pas na /
analyzed: sgra yi rnam shes mtshan nyid ni // zhes bya ba ni sgra la gdod ma nas skye ba med pa nyid kyis shes pas na /
translated: The characteristic of the consciousness of sound

original: de'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: is the characteristic of that, because of the understanding that sound is primordially non-arisen.

original: de ltar rna ba'i dbang po'i rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rna ba'i dbang po'i rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the purity of the ear sense-faculty,

original: sna'i dbang po'i rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sna'i dbang po'i rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain the purity of the nose sense-faculty,

original: dri'i bye brag rnam par rtogs pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: dri'i bye brag rnam par rtogs pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he says, the conceptualization of the various smells.

original: dri rnam pa bzhi'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
analyzed: dri rnam pa bzhi'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
translated: The conceptualization of the four types of smellsüîΩis the conceptualization of the various smells.

original: rtog pa'i ngo bo rab tu dbye ba gang yin pa de la kun nas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sgom pa po'o //
analyzed: rtog pa'i ngo bo rab tu dbye ba gang yin pa de la kun nas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sgom pa po'o //
translated: The nature of the conceptualization is thoroughly empty, by way of the nature of emptiness.

original: nam mkha' snying po zhes bya ba ni dri'i rnam par rtog pa stong pa nyid kyis 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' snying po zhes bya ba ni dri'i rnam par rtog pa stong pa nyid kyis 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúAkƒÅ≈õagarbha‚Äù is the conceptualization of smell, because it is empty of the nature of grasping.

original: shes zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //üîΩsna yi rnam shes mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: shes zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o // sna yi rnam shes mtshan nyid ni //
translated: ‚ÄúKnowledge‚Äù is what is to be known.üîΩThe characteristic of the nose consciousnessüîΩis the knowledge of the nose.

original: bzhes bya ba ni dri 'dzin par byed pa'i sna la gdod ma nas skye ba med par shes pas de'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: bzhes bya ba ni dri 'dzin par byed pa'i sna la gdod ma nas skye ba med par shes pas de'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: The characteristic of the nose is the knowledge of the nose, because it is known that the nose, which is the apprehender of smell, is primordially non-arisen.

original: de ltar sna'i dbang po'i rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar sna'i dbang po'i rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the purity of the nose sense faculty,

original: lce'i dbang po 'dir nam par dag pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lce'i dbang po 'dir nam par dag pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to describe the purity of the tongue sense faculty here,

original: ro yi bye brag la rtog pa //
analyzed: ro yi bye brag la rtog pa //
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚ÄúThe conceptualization of the various tastes,‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: and so on.

original: ro rnam pa drug gi bye brag la rnam par rtog pa'i ngo ngo ste /üîΩde'i rab tu dbye ba ni /
analyzed: ro rnam pa drug gi bye brag la rnam par rtog pa'i ngo ngo ste / de'i rab tu dbye ba ni /
translated: The nature of the conceptualization is the various tastes of the six types.üîΩIts differentiation

original: rab tu dbye ba'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu dbye ba'i rnam pa'o //
translated: is the aspect of differentiation.

original: de la kun nas stong pa'i nyid kyi rnam pas bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: de la kun nas stong pa'i nyid kyi rnam pas bsgom pa'o //
translated: One should meditate on it with the aspect of emptiness of the whole.

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug tu ni zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug tu ni zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The Lord of the World,

original: 'jig rten na gnas pa'i ro'i rab tu dbye ba la stong pa nyid rtogs pa las /
analyzed: 'jig rten na gnas pa'i ro'i rab tu dbye ba la stong pa nyid rtogs pa las /
translated: in the differentiation of the corpse in the world, through the realization of emptiness,

original: rang dga' nyid thob pa'i phyir 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
analyzed: rang dga' nyid thob pa'i phyir 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
translated: one becomes the Lord of the World, having attained one's own delight.

original: shes zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
translated: One should know means one should understand.

original: lce'i rnam shes mtshan nyid ni lce'i yul dang bcas pa la stong pa nyid du shes pas de'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan do //
analyzed: lce'i rnam shes mtshan nyid ni lce'i yul dang bcas pa la stong pa nyid du shes pas de'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan do //
translated: The characteristic of the tongue consciousness is the understanding of the tongue and its objects as emptiness.

original: de ltar lce'i dbang po'i rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar lce'i dbang po'i rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the purity of the tongue faculty,

original: lus kyi dbang bo'i rnam par dag pa brjod pa'i phyir /üîΩreg bya'i bye brag la spyod pa //
analyzed: lus kyi dbang bo'i rnam par dag pa brjod pa'i phyir / reg bya'i bye brag la spyod pa //
translated: in order to express the purity of the body faculty,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: he says,üîΩExperiencing the varieties of tactile objects,

original: rnam pa bcu gcig gi bdag nyid kyi rab tu dbye @159a * //
analyzed: rnam pa bcu gcig gi bdag nyid kyi rab tu dbye @159a * //
translated: The tactile objects are of eleven varieties.

original: ba'o ; / de'i kun nas stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas bsgoms pas sgom pa'o //
analyzed: ba'o ; / de'i kun nas stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas bsgoms pas sgom pa'o //
translated: Meditating on it with the aspect of its emptiness, one meditates.

original: sgrib pa thams cad can rnams sel zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sgrib pa thams cad can rnams sel zhes bya ba ni /
translated: All obscurations means all obscurations that arise through the power of contact.

original: reg pa'i stobs kyis skyes pa'i sgrib pa thams cad ni 'dod chags pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams rnam par sel bar byed pa ni /
analyzed: reg pa'i stobs kyis skyes pa'i sgrib pa thams cad ni 'dod chags pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams rnam par sel bar byed pa ni /
translated: The afflictions of desire and so forth are removed by it.

original: dus de tsam du bzlas pa'i phyir sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'o //
analyzed: dus de tsam du bzlas pa'i phyir sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'o //
translated: Since it recites all obscurations at that time, it is the remover of all obscurations.

original: reg bya'i rnam shes mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: reg bya'i rnam shes mtshan nyid ni //
translated: The consciousness of touch is its characteristic.

original: zhes bya ba ni reg pa la gdod ma nas skyes pa nyid kyi rnam par shes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni reg pa la gdod ma nas skyes pa nyid kyi rnam par shes pa ste /
translated: This is the consciousness that arises from the beginning in contact.

original: de'i mtshan nyid gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which has that as its characteristic is called that.

original: de ltar lus kyi dbang po'i rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar lus kyi dbang po'i rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the purity of the body faculty,

original: yid kyi dbang po'i rnam par dag pa brjod pa'i phyir /üîΩyid khyi bye brag la spyod pa //
analyzed: yid kyi dbang po'i rnam par dag pa brjod pa'i phyir / yid khyi bye brag la spyod pa //
translated: in order to express the purity of the mental faculty,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: it is said:üîΩThe mind is the experiencer of distinctions.

original: yid kyi bye brag la ltos nas /
analyzed: yid kyi bye brag la ltos nas /
translated: In dependence on the distinctions of the mind,

original: rdzas bdun gyi bdag nyid chos kyi skye mched kyi mtshan nyid dang / yul can la ltos nas sna tshogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rtog pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rdzas bdun gyi bdag nyid chos kyi skye mched kyi mtshan nyid dang / yul can la ltos nas sna tshogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rtog pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of conceptualization is the characteristic of the dharma-ƒÅyatana, which has the nature of the seven substances, and the characteristic of the various conceptualizations in dependence on the subject.

original: de'i rab tu dbye ba ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: de'i rab tu dbye ba ni khyad par ro //
translated: Its differentiation is the distinction.

original: de la kun nas ni ma lus pa la stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa bsgoms pa de sgom pa po'o //
analyzed: de la kun nas ni ma lus pa la stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa bsgoms pa de sgom pa po'o //
translated: There, the one who meditates on emptiness completely and without remainder is the meditator.

original: yid kyi rnam shes zhes gsungs pa //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam shes zhes gsungs pa //
translated: It is said to be mental consciousness.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is what is said:

original: 'jig rten pa la grags pa gang yin pa de ni 'jam dpal zhes brjod pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa la grags pa gang yin pa de ni 'jam dpal zhes brjod pa yin zhe na /
translated: Whatever is known in the world, that is called Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´.

original: de'i rang bzhin med pa shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin med pa shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because its nature is known to be nonexistent.

original: de ltar yid kyi dbang po rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar yid kyi dbang po rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the pure mental faculty,

original: lus kyi dbang po'i lhag mar gyur pa rgyus pa kun gyi rnam par dag pa brjod pa'i phyir /üîΩrgyus pa kun la nges par sbyar //
analyzed: lus kyi dbang po'i lhag mar gyur pa rgyus pa kun gyi rnam par dag pa brjod pa'i phyir / rgyus pa kun la nges par sbyar //
translated: in order to explain the purity of the remaining bodily faculty, the sinew,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: it is said: It is definitely applied to all sinews.

original: lus su gtogs pa'i rgyus pa kun las nges par sbyor ba'i bye brag ni /
analyzed: lus su gtogs pa'i rgyus pa kun las nges par sbyor ba'i bye brag ni /
translated: The special application to all the sinews of the body is

original: yang dag par sbyor ba'i khyad par la'o //
analyzed: yang dag par sbyor ba'i khyad par la'o //
translated: in the special application to reality.

original: yongs su zhes bya ba ni kun nas so //
analyzed: yongs su zhes bya ba ni kun nas so //
translated: Thoroughly means completely.

original: sgom pa po zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin med pa sgom pa po'o //
analyzed: sgom pa po zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin med pa sgom pa po'o //
translated: The meditator is the meditator on the absence of intrinsic reality.

original: byams pa nyid du yongs su shes //
analyzed: byams pa nyid du yongs su shes //
translated: One should know love itself.

original: zhes bya ba ni rgyus pa kun la rang bzhin med pa nyid du yongs su shes pas dga' ba khyad par can bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rgyus pa kun la rang bzhin med pa nyid du yongs su shes pas dga' ba khyad par can bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: means that by knowing the absence of intrinsic reality in all the sinews, one generates a special joy.

original: bag chags rtog pa'i bdag nyid can //
analyzed: bag chags rtog pa'i bdag nyid can //
translated: The habitual notion is the nature of the self.

original: zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means that in order to purify the defiled mind consciousness.

original: de ltar lus kyi dbang po'i lhag mar gyur pa rgyus pa kun las nges par sbyor ba rnam par dag pa la bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar lus kyi dbang po'i lhag mar gyur pa rgyus pa kun las nges par sbyor ba rnam par dag pa la bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the purification of the special application to all the sinews that are the remainder of the body faculty,

original: lus thams cad tshigs su rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lus thams cad tshigs su rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the purification of all the joints of the body,üîΩhe says:

original: rtsa rnams so so'i @159b bdag nyid can //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rtsa rnams so so'i @159b bdag nyid can // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The channels are of individual natures.

original: rang gi lus su gtogs pa'i rtsa rnams thams cad kyi rab tu dbye ba'i bdag nyid ni khyad par can gyi bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: rang gi lus su gtogs pa'i rtsa rnams thams cad kyi rab tu dbye ba'i bdag nyid ni khyad par can gyi bdag nyid can no //
translated: The channels that belong to one's own body are of the nature of the divisions, of the special natures.

original: bde ba kun gyi gzhi zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bde ba kun gyi gzhi zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The basis of all bliss is

original: rtsa ba'i rnam par rtog pa bzlog nas /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i rnam par rtog pa bzlog nas /
translated: having turned away from the conceptual thoughts of the root.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba kun la brten nas so //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba kun la brten nas so //
translated: It is based on all the supramundane bliss.

original: mchog ces bya ba ni gdong la sogs pa'i dbyi bas can nyid kyis rnam par dben pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog ces bya ba ni gdong la sogs pa'i dbyi bas can nyid kyis rnam par dben pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Supreme is because of being isolated by the absence of the face, etc.

original: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag / ces bya ba ni dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo'i bdag nyid gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag / ces bya ba ni dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo'i bdag nyid gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The nature of all things is the self is said of that which has the nature of the essence of all things.

original: de kho na nyid kyi rnam pa dun gzhi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid can kun tu bzang por grags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi rnam pa dun gzhi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid can kun tu bzang por grags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The three aspects of reality are the nature of the pure consciousness of the basis, because of being renowned as Samantabhadra.

original: kun du bzang por zhes bya ba ni kun ni rtsa rnams kyi rtog pa la dben pas tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun du bzang por zhes bya ba ni kun ni rtsa rnams kyi rtog pa la dben pas tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The term Samantabhadra is a tatpurusa compound: all refers to the channels, which are differentiated because they are isolated from conceptualization;

original: bzang po ni dge ba gang rnams yod pa de rnams zhes bya bar byas nas so //
analyzed: bzang po ni dge ba gang rnams yod pa de rnams zhes bya bar byas nas so //
translated: the term bhadra means virtuous, and the compound means those who have that.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni rnam pa 'di nyid kyis ming du byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni rnam pa 'di nyid kyis ming du byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The term this is a tatpurusa compound, because it is named after this very aspect.

original: de ltar don rnam pa brgyad kyis rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar don rnam pa brgyad kyis rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the extensive explanation by means of eight topics,

original: nye bar bsdu pa'i phyir brjod pa ni /üîΩde ltar rnam shes tshogs brgyad sogs //
analyzed: nye bar bsdu pa'i phyir brjod pa ni / de ltar rnam shes tshogs brgyad sogs //
translated: in order to summarize, he says:üîΩThus, the eight collections of consciousness and so forth

original: zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: are the essence of the eight collections of consciousness, such as the eye consciousness.

original: yang dag de nyid ces bya ba ni nang gi skye mched rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yang dag de nyid ces bya ba ni nang gi skye mched rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The term true reality is a tatpurusa compound, because it is the essence of the inner sense bases that are pure.

original: bla na med ces bya ba ni bla na med pa lus rnam par dben pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi de kho na nyid kyi rgyu nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bla na med ces bya ba ni bla na med pa lus rnam par dben pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi de kho na nyid kyi rgyu nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The term ‚Äúunsurpassed‚Äù is used because it is the cause of reality, which is characterized by the isolation of the body.

original: mig sogs dbang po rnam shes ni //
analyzed: mig sogs dbang po rnam shes ni //
translated: The consciousnesses of the eye, etc.

original: zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po drug po rnams lus kyi dbang po'i khyad par du gyur pa gnyis po dag ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po drug po rnams lus kyi dbang po'i khyad par du gyur pa gnyis po dag ni /

original: nyon mongs pa can gyi rnam par shes pa dang / kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid can gnyis po dag gi rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid bgrangs nas rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can gyi rnam par shes pa dang / kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid can gnyis po dag gi rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid bgrangs nas rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad du 'gyur ro //

original: gzugs sogs mthong ba'i mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: gzugs sogs mthong ba'i mtshan nyid ni //

original: zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa drug po dang / rgyus pa thams cad dang / yan lag gi tshogs thams cad kyi mtshan nyid can gyi lus kyi dbang po'i yul bye brag tu gyur pa rnams so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa drug po dang / rgyus pa thams cad dang / yan lag gi tshogs thams cad kyi mtshan nyid can gyi lus kyi dbang po'i yul bye brag tu gyur pa rnams so //

original: mthong ba'i mtshan thams can zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mthong ba'i mtshan thams can zhes bya ba ni /

original: mthong ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mthong ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: means the characteristics of seeing and so forth.

original: de ltar rnam par gsum gyi nang gi bdag nyid kyi skye mched kyi dbye ba bstan nas /üîΩyan lag nyid kyi dbye ba brjod pa'i phyir de'i yan lag @160a * //

translated: Having thus explained the brief explanation, in order to explain the extensive explanation through the mantra of the wrathful one,üîΩhe says Yam√¢ntaka, etc.

original: gshin rje mthar byed bo //
analyzed: gshin rje mthar byed bo //

original: gshin rje ni dmyal ba'o //
analyzed: gshin rje ni dmyal ba'o //

analyzed: gshin rje'i ma rig pa'o //

original: nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to //

analyzed: shes rab rnam par bcad pas nyon mongs pa mthar byed pas na de skad ces bya ste /

original: drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to //

analyzed: de la 'od gsal ba zhugs pas mthar byed pa'i phyir shes rab mthar byed do //

original: nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to //

analyzed: padma mthar byed ces bya ba ni padma mthar byed do //

original: drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to //

original: padma ni skye gnas so //
analyzed: padma ni skye gnas so //

original: mthar ni dbus te /
analyzed: mthar ni dbus te /

analyzed: de la bde ba byed pas na padma mthar byed de /

original: nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to //

analyzed: drang ba'i don to //

analyzed: bgegs ni khams rnams so //

original: nges pa'i don to //

analyzed: 'dod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba ni /

original: zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa bzlog pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //üîΩdbang po thams cad mnyam par sbyor //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa bzlog pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro // dbang po thams cad mnyam par sbyor //

original: zhes bya ba ni so sor sdud pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni so sor sdud pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: dbang po thams cad ni lnga ste /

original: dngos po thams cad gcig pa'i lus //

original: ngag gi rnam rtog kun spangs pa //

original: kun la khyab pa zhes bya ba ni /

original: rnal 'byor mchog ces bya ba ni /

analyzed: bla na med pa'i phyir ro //

original: cha bral zhes bya ba ni ;

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sgra dang rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni brag ca dang 'dra ba'i sgra la'o //

original: yang dag thim zhes bya ba ni nang du thim pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag thim zhes bya ba ni nang du thim pa'o //

original: sgra tsam mchog gi nam mkha' la //
analyzed: sgra tsam mchog gi nam mkha' la //
translated: ‚Äú In the space of a hair tip‚Äù means in the emptiness that is the nature of the completion of sound.üîΩ‚Äú The mere sound dissolves into supreme space‚Äù means that the sound dissolves into the space of the mind.

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mchog gi nam mkha' la'o //

original: de yang @163b zhes bya ba ni mchog gi nam mkha'o //
analyzed: de yang @163b zhes bya ba ni mchog gi nam mkha'o //

original: 'gro zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'o //

original: 'od gsal zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba la'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba la'o //

analyzed: 'od gsal go 'phang zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam pa'i 'dug pa'i gnas so //

original: gsal por ni zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o ;
analyzed: gsal por ni zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o ;
translated: Clearly is in the natural purity.

original: / shin tu rnam par dag ces bya ba ni dri ma med pa'i rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: / shin tu rnam par dag ces bya ba ni dri ma med pa'i rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'o //

original: chos dbyings te zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: chos dbyings te zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi ngo bo'o //
translated: The realm of phenomena is the nature of all phenomena.

original: gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Nondual is because of the absence of the conception of difference.

original: ye shes mchog ces bya ba ni ye shes med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ye shes mchog ces bya ba ni ye shes med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Supreme intuition is because of the nature of the absence of intuition.

original: rab tu sad cing zhes bya ba ni lam gyi stobs kyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab tu sad cing zhes bya ba ni lam gyi stobs kyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is well awakened because it is purified by the power of the path.

original: rtag tu 'char zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rtogs pa'i phyir ro //üîΩngag gi spyod pa rnams dang bral //
analyzed: rtag tu 'char zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rtogs pa'i phyir ro // ngag gi spyod pa rnams dang bral //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sgra dang rnam par rtog pa'i yul ma yin pa nyid kyis so // gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs //

original: zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩphung po lnga ni gcig pu'i gzhi //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro // phung po lnga ni gcig pu'i gzhi //
translated: It is free from all duality because it is free from the discursive thought of differentiation.

original: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi phyir de la brten pa'o //üîΩ'byung ba lnga ni yang dag brtan //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi phyir de la brten pa'o // 'byung ba lnga ni yang dag brtan //
translated: It is the basis of the five aggregates because it is based on the five aggregates.

original: zhes bya ba ni sa la sogs pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //üîΩrnam shes brgyad kyi ngo bor 'gyur //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sa la sogs pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro // rnam shes brgyad kyi ngo bor 'gyur //

original: zhes bya ba ni de'i rang bzhin ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de'i rang bzhin ni snga ma bzhin no //

original: phyi yi yul drug bsdus pa ni //
analyzed: phyi yi yul drug bsdus pa ni //

original: zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is the very object of form and so forth.

original: rlung bcu shes pa zhes bya ba ni rlung bcu'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rlung bcu shes pa zhes bya ba ni rlung bcu'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The knowledge of the ten winds is because it is the nature of the ten winds.

original: shes pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni shes pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: shes pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni shes pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid do //

original: thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni rim pa thams cad bsdus pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni rim pa thams cad bsdus pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The compendium of all is the essence that comprises all stages.

original: de ltar nang du bsdus pa'i sgo nas khyad par du sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar nang du bsdus pa'i sgo nas khyad par du sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo bstan nas /

analyzed: yang dag spro bar byed pa'i rgyu ni /

translated: The group of topics taught in the twenty-third chapter.

original: ming gi dbye ba rnam par zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas gnod mdzes kyi mthar thug pa'i ming gi dbye bas so //
analyzed: ming gi dbye ba rnam par zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas gnod mdzes kyi mthar thug pa'i ming gi dbye bas so //
translated: The classification of names is by the classification of names from Vairochana up to Sumbha.

original: sngags kyi dbye ba'i zhes bya ba ni badzri dhri ka la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis so //
analyzed: sngags kyi dbye ba'i zhes bya ba ni badzri dhri ka la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis so //
translated: The classification of mantras is by the characteristics of vajradhrk, etc.

original: rim pa yis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig spyod ma dang / rjes su spyod ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo'i rims rnams kyis so //
analyzed: rim pa yis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig spyod ma dang / rjes su spyod ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo'i rims rnams kyis so //
translated: By the sequence is by the sequence of the Tathagatas, the companions, the followers, the Bodhisattvas, and the wrathful ones.

original: sngags dgod pa yi rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: sngags dgod pa yi rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: By the yoga of arranging the mantras.

original: zhes bya ba ni aom yig dang h'um yig gi mtshan nyid can du rnal 'byor gyis dus su bstan pa ji cho ga bzhin du sngags dgod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni aom yig dang h'um yig gi mtshan nyid can du rnal 'byor gyis dus su bstan pa ji cho ga bzhin du sngags dgod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
translated: By the yoga of arranging the mantras, which has the characteristic of the syllable om and the syllable hum, at the proper time, according to the ritual as taught.

original: rim bzhin gnas kyi dbye ba yis //
analyzed: rim bzhin gnas kyi dbye ba yis //
translated: By the sequence of the classification of the abodes.

original: zhes bya ba ni gnas kyi rab tu dbye bas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnas kyi rab tu dbye bas so //
translated: This is the division of the places.

original: man ngag gis zhes bya ba ni brgyud pa'i rim pa'i ngo bos so//
analyzed: man ngag gis zhes bya ba ni brgyud pa'i rim pa'i ngo bos so//
translated: By means of the precepts, that is, by the nature of the sequence of the lineage.

original: rnam nges bya zhes bya ba ni nges par byas nas so //
analyzed: rnam nges bya zhes bya ba ni nges par byas nas so //
translated: One should ascertain, that is, having ascertained.

original: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bos so //
analyzed: yang dag ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bos so //
translated: Correctly, that is, by the nature of non-error.

original: gnas kyi dbye ba dang zhes bya ba ni rang gi lus la mgo bo dang lte ba dang mgrin pa dang gsang ba dang snying ga'i rab tu dbye bas so //
analyzed: gnas kyi dbye ba dang zhes bya ba ni rang gi lus la mgo bo dang lte ba dang mgrin pa dang gsang ba dang snying ga'i rab tu dbye bas so //
translated: The division of the places, that is, by the division of the head, navel, throat, secret place, and heart center in one's own body.

original: mchod par bya zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: mchod par bya zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ba'o //
translated: One should worship, that is, one should express.

original: rab tu 'bad de zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyis so //
analyzed: rab tu 'bad de zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyis so //
translated: With effort, that is, with exertion.

original: 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod cing //
analyzed: 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod cing //
translated: Enjoying the five objects of desire,

original: zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul lnga la nye bar longs spyod pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul lnga la nye bar longs spyod pas so //
translated: that is, by enjoying the five objects of form and so on.

original: lha mo zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor bdag nyid do //
analyzed: lha mo zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor bdag nyid do //
translated: The goddesses, that is, the nature of the mandala of thirty-two, Ak·π£obhya and so on.

original: rnal 'byor pas zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa @176a * //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa @176a * //
translated: The yogin is one who has attained the stage of generation.

original: dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgom pa po rnams kyis so //
analyzed: dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgom pa po rnams kyis so //
translated: The yogin is one who meditates on the creation and completion stages.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni rgyun mi 'chad par ro //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni rgyun mi 'chad par ro //
translated: The always means uninterruptedly.

original: bdag la byin rlab pas rim de nyid //
analyzed: bdag la byin rlab pas rim de nyid //
translated: The blessing of the self is the very stage.

original: ces bya ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that those who abide in the illusion-like meditative stabilization.

original: de ltar da nyid la sngags la sogs pa brjod pa'i sgo nas mchod pa bsten nas /
analyzed: de ltar da nyid la sngags la sogs pa brjod pa'i sgo nas mchod pa bsten nas /
translated: Having thus relied on worship through the utterance of mantras, etc.,

original: da ni phyi rol gyi lha la mchod pa dgag pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //üîΩphyi rol lha la phyag mi bya //
analyzed: da ni phyi rol gyi lha la mchod pa dgag pa bstan pa'i phyir ro // phyi rol lha la phyag mi bya //
translated: now, in order to teach the prohibition of external worship of the deity,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, Do not bow to external deities.

original: bcos ma nyid kyi phyir ro //üîΩrdo shing sa yi rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: bcos ma nyid kyi phyir ro // rdo shing sa yi rang bzhin gyis //
translated: The meaning is that one should not bow to external deities, such as Brahma, Vishnu, and Rudra, because they are artificial.

original: zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
translated: The nature of stone, wood, and earth is easy to understand.

original: de ltar rang gi ngo bo bstan nas da ni de'i rgyu mtshan bstan pa'i phyir ;
analyzed: de ltar rang gi ngo bo bstan nas da ni de'i rgyu mtshan bstan pa'i phyir ;
translated: Having thus taught its nature, now, in order to teach its reason,

original: bdag la byin rlabs sgrib pa med //
analyzed: bdag la byin rlabs sgrib pa med //
translated: he says, The blessing of the self is unobstructed.

original: ces gsungs te /
analyzed: ces gsungs te /
translated: Thus he spoke.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ni ma gtogs pa las so //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ni ma gtogs pa las so //
translated: Except for the illusion-like meditative stabilization.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'o //
translated: Other means different.

original: de kho na nyid ces bya ba ni mchod bya'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid ces bya ba ni mchod bya'i ngo bo'o //
translated: Reality means the nature of the object of worship.

original: srid pa gsum na zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa gsum na zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: In the three worlds means in the desire realm, etc.

original: sa gsum gyi mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: sa gsum gyi mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The three worlds have the characteristic of the three realms.

original: med ces bya ba ni yod pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: med ces bya ba ni yod pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Nonexistent means not existing.

original: bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa nyid la 'dis mchod bya nyid du brjod do //
analyzed: bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa nyid la 'dis mchod bya nyid du brjod do //
translated: In the self-consecration itself, this is said to be the object of worship.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu'i dbang phyug sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa po rnams la brten nas 'di brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu'i dbang phyug sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa po rnams la brten nas 'di brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is said in dependence on the bodhisattvas who are lords of the ten stages and who practice the mantra vehicle.

original: gzhan du na rgyang pan pa ltar med pa por lnga pa nyid kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na rgyang pan pa ltar med pa por lnga pa nyid kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, like the Carvakas, they would be nihilists, and their roots of virtue would be cut off by the fifth stage.

original: rjes su 'gro pa'i sgo nas de nyid ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro pa'i sgo nas de nyid ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: In terms of their going after, he speaks of reality.

original: rang byin gyis brlabs pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: rang byin gyis brlabs pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The nature of self-consecration.

original: rnal 'byor mchog ces bya ba ni khyad par can gyi mchod pa'i snod do //
analyzed: rnal 'byor mchog ces bya ba ni khyad par can gyi mchod pa'i snod do //
translated: The supreme yoga is the vessel of the special worship.

original: bdag la byin rlab pa zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog nyid can no //
analyzed: bdag la byin rlab pa zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog nyid can no //
translated: The blessing of the self is the supreme nature of the illusion-like samadhi.

original: rnyog pa med ces bya ni bden pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis ma gos pa'o //
analyzed: rnyog pa med ces bya ni bden pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis ma gos pa'o //
translated: The unpolluted is the non-soiling by the concepts of the truths.

original: de ltar de'i rgyu mtshan brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar de'i rgyu mtshan brjod nas /
translated: Having thus stated the reason for that,

original: da ni phyi rol gyi sngags kyi bzlas pa la sogs pa dgag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni phyi rol gyi sngags kyi bzlas pa la sogs pa dgag pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to prohibit the external mantra recitation, etc.,

original: phyi yi dngos po mi bgrod ste //
analyzed: phyi yi dngos po mi bgrod ste //
translated: he says, The external thing is not to be traversed,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so forth.

original: bris sku la sogs pa lha'i gzugs la dmigs pa de brtan pa'i don du /
analyzed: bris sku la sogs pa lha'i gzugs la dmigs pa de brtan pa'i don du /
translated: In order to stabilize the observation of the deity's form, such as the painted image, etc.,

original: phyi rol gyi dngos po sbyin sreg la sogs pa byed pa'i dus su ba grang par mi bya'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi dngos po sbyin sreg la sogs pa byed pa'i dus su ba grang par mi bya'o //
translated: at the time of performing the external things, such as the burnt offering, etc., one should not be distracted.

original: yang na phyi rol gyi dngos po lha'i rnam pa dngos po mnyam du mi bgrang pa ni /
analyzed: yang na phyi rol gyi dngos po lha'i rnam pa dngos po mnyam du mi bgrang pa ni /
translated: Or else, the external thing, the deity's form, is not to be counted as the same thing,

original: sems la dngos po nyid kyis mi bya'o //
analyzed: sems la dngos po nyid kyis mi bya'o //
translated: and one should not make the thing of the mind.

original: sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pa la sogs zhes bya ba ni de yang ston bzhin du @176b bgrang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgya'i rim pa la sogs zhes bya ba ni de yang ston bzhin du @176b bgrang bar mi bya'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe stages of mantra, seal, and so on‚Äù means that this should not be counted as a teaching.

original: dngos po nyid du dgag par mi bya ste /
analyzed: dngos po nyid du dgag par mi bya ste /
translated: One should not deny the very existence of the external world,

original: de bcos ma nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de bcos ma nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is a fabrication.

original: de ltar phyi rol gyi sngags kyi bzlas pa la sogs pa dgag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar phyi rol gyi sngags kyi bzlas pa la sogs pa dgag pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the denial of external mantra recitation and so on,

original: da ni rang byin gyis brlabs pa'i gdams ngag la gdon mi za bar btsal bar bya ba nyid brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rang byin gyis brlabs pa'i gdams ngag la gdon mi za bar btsal bar bya ba nyid brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to state the necessity of seeking the instruction of self-consecration,

original: byin gyis brlab par bya zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: byin gyis brlab par bya zhes gsungs te /
translated: he says, ‚Äúone should seek consecration.‚Äù

original: bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i mtshan nyid btsal bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
analyzed: bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i mtshan nyid btsal bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang 'brel to //
translated: The meaning is that one should seek the characteristic of self-consecration.

original: gang las she na /
analyzed: gang las she na /
translated: From where?

original: de'i phyir de nyid thob pa'i rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma las zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de nyid thob pa'i rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma las zhes gsungs te /
translated: Therefore he says, ‚Äúfrom the yoga and yoginƒ´ who have attained reality.‚Äù

original: de nyid thob pa'i rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i zhal las shes par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid thob pa'i rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i zhal las shes par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should know it from the mouth of the yoga and yoginƒ´ who have attained reality.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: de'i phyir mchog ces gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mchog ces gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, it is called supreme,

original: bden pa la mngon par zhen pa'i gnyen po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bden pa la mngon par zhen pa'i gnyen po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the antidote to the attachment to truth.

original: 'bad pas zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus brtan pas so //
analyzed: 'bad pas zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus brtan pas so //
translated: By effort means by firm effort.

original: gzhan yang ji lta bus byin gyis brlab ce na /
analyzed: gzhan yang ji lta bus byin gyis brlab ce na /
translated: Moreover, by what kind of consecration?üîΩTherefore, it is said,

original: de'i phyir bdag byin rlabs thob pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bdag byin rlabs thob pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: it is characterized by the attainment of self-consecration.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ni thob pa'i mtshan nyid can zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ni thob pa'i mtshan nyid can zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is characterized by the attainment of the illusion-like meditative stabilization.üîΩThe extensive commentary on the glorious Vajra-garland

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
translated: of the great yoga tantra,üîΩcalled Clarifying the Meaning of the Profound,

original: pandi ta aa lam ka ka la shas mdzad pa zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: pandi ta aa lam ka ka la shas mdzad pa zab mo'i don shin tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba las /
translated: was composed by the pa·πá·∏çita Ala·πÉkakala≈õa.

original: le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the extensive explanation of the twenty-sixth chapterüîΩof the glorious Vajra-garlandüîΩof the great yoga tantra.

original: // / de ltar le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pas /
analyzed: // / de ltar le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pas /
translated: Thus, the twenty-sixth chapterüîΩhas explained the reply to the question about the object

original: lus la lha zhes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yul la dri ba'i lan bstan nas /
analyzed: lus la lha zhes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yul la dri ba'i lan bstan nas /
translated: with the characteristic of the deity in the body.

original: da ni lha'i 'khor lo'i yul la dri ba'i lan brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni lha'i 'khor lo'i yul la dri ba'i lan brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to state the reply to the question of the domain of the divine wheel,

original: le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa nye bar 'god cing /
analyzed: le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa nye bar 'god cing /
translated: chapter twenty-seven is presented.

original: dang por re zhig de rtsom pa ni /
analyzed: dang por re zhig de rtsom pa ni /
translated: First, at the outset, it is begun:

original: de rnams kun gyi ming zhes bya ba la logs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de rnams kun gyi ming zhes bya ba la logs pa gsungs te /
translated: The names of all of them will be explained.

original: de rnams zhes bya ba ni lus la gnas ba rnams pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams zhes bya ba ni lus la gnas ba rnams pa'o //
translated: All of them refers to the parts that abide in the body.

original: ming zhes bya ba ni ming gi ngo bo rnams so //
analyzed: ming zhes bya ba ni ming gi ngo bo rnams so //
translated: Names refers to the entities of the names.

original: bshad par bya zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bshad par bya zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ba'o //
translated: Will be explained means will be expressed.

original: lha mo yis zhes bya ba ni rigs ldas bsdus pa 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams so //
analyzed: lha mo yis zhes bya ba ni rigs ldas bsdus pa 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams so //
translated: By the goddess refers to the goddesses that will be explained as being included in the families.

original: de nas gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'i rjes la'o //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'i rjes la'o //
translated: Then, moreover is after chapter twenty-six.

original: ji ltar zhe na /üîΩde'i phyir / 'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na / de'i phyir / 'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis //
translated: How?

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /üîΩsbrul pa la sogs pa'i 'khor lo bzhi'i rab tu dbye bas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te / sbrul pa la sogs pa'i 'khor lo bzhi'i rab tu dbye bas so //
translated: Therefore, it is said,üîΩBy the divisions of the four wheels.

original: rtsa yi rnam pa'i grangs kyi ni //
analyzed: rtsa yi rnam pa'i grangs kyi ni //
translated: The four wheels are the emanation wheel, and so on.üîΩBy the enumeration of the aspects of the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s

original: zhes bya ba ni rtsa rnams ni drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / brgyad dang bcu drug dang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi ngo bo rnams kyi'o //üîΩgrangs kyis ni @177a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rtsa rnams ni drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / brgyad dang bcu drug dang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi ngo bo rnams kyi'o // grangs kyis ni @177a * //
translated: Thus, of the channels is of the essence of sixty-four, eight, and thirty-two.

original: zhes bya ba ni grangs kyi rim pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni grangs kyi rim pas so //
translated: By number is by the order of number.

original: de ltar de'i rtsom pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar de'i rtsom pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the composition,

original: de ni de'i 'khor lo dngos su bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni de'i 'khor lo dngos su bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to state the actual wheel of that,

original: de'i yan lag rigs rnam pa lnga'i rnam par gzhag pa ni las dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i yan lag rigs rnam pa lnga'i rnam par gzhag pa ni las dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: the five types of family that are its branches are stated by the words action and so forth.

original: las kyi sgras ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo don yod grub pa'i rigs so //
analyzed: las kyi sgras ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo don yod grub pa'i rigs so //
translated: The word action is Amoghasiddhi family, the essence of the purified exalted activity wisdom.

original: rdo rje'i sgras ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin mi bskyod pa'i rigs so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i sgras ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin mi bskyod pa'i rigs so //
translated: The word vajra is Akshobhya family, the nature of the extremely pure realm of reality.

original: de bzhin pad ces bya ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin snang ba mtha' yas kyi rigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin pad ces bya ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin snang ba mtha' yas kyi rigs so //
translated: Similarly, lotus is Amitabha family, the nature of the wisdom of individual investigation.

original: 'khor lo rnams kyi zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'khor lo'i sgras ni /
analyzed: 'khor lo rnams kyi zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'khor lo'i sgras ni /
translated: By the wheels, etc.

original: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs so //
analyzed: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs so //
translated: The word wheel refers to the family of Vairocana, which is the essence of mirror-like intuition.üîΩBy the divisions, etc.

original: dbye ba yis zhes bya ba ni de'i rab tu dbye bas so //
analyzed: dbye ba yis zhes bya ba ni de'i rab tu dbye bas so //
translated: means by the divisions of that.

original: rigs bzhi yi ni dbye ba yis //
analyzed: rigs bzhi yi ni dbye ba yis //
translated: By the division of the four families,

original: zhes bya ba ni don yod grub pa la sogs pa rigs bzhi'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni don yod grub pa la sogs pa rigs bzhi'i dbye bas so //
translated: means by the division of the four families of Amoghasiddhi, etc.

original: rtsa'i zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo bzhir rtogs pa rnams so//
analyzed: rtsa'i zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo bzhir rtogs pa rnams so//
translated: The channels are the four wheels.

original: yang dag gnas zhes bya ba ni rim pas gnas pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag gnas zhes bya ba ni rim pas gnas pa'o //
translated: The right placement is the sequential placement.

original: gal te de ltar yin na rigs bzhi dang 'khor lo bzhi'i dbye bas gsungs te /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yin na rigs bzhi dang 'khor lo bzhi'i dbye bas gsungs te /
translated: If that is so, then the four families and the four wheels are taught by the division of the four families.

original: rigs lnga pa gang du gsungs she na /
analyzed: rigs lnga pa gang du gsungs she na /
translated: But where is the fivefold family taught?

original: de'i phyir rigs ni lnga pa yang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rigs ni lnga pa yang zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore he says, the fivefold family is also.

original: rigs lnga pa zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs so //
analyzed: rigs lnga pa zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs so //
translated: The fivefold family is the family of Ratnasa·πÉbhava.

original: 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo bzhi pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo bzhi pa rnams la'o //
translated: Here, in the four wheels, etc.

original: thams cad kyi ni khongs na 'dod //
analyzed: thams cad kyi ni khongs na 'dod //
translated: in the middle of all.

original: ces bya ba ni 'khor lo bzhi po yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni 'khor lo bzhi po yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that the four wheels are also.

original: de gang yin zhe na /üîΩde'i phyir / tshor ba nyams su myong ba'i dngos //
analyzed: de gang yin zhe na / de'i phyir / tshor ba nyams su myong ba'i dngos //
translated: What is that?üîΩTherefore it is said:

original: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes gsungs te /
translated: The reality of the experience of feeling.

original: bde ba la sogs pa'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa ste /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa ste /
translated: The form of the experience of the feeling of pleasure, etc.

original: tshor ba thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyis rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ro bo ste /
analyzed: tshor ba thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyis rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ro bo ste /
translated: The nature of Ratnasa·πÉbhava, by the sameness of all feelings.

original: bsod nams kyi tshogs med par sangs rgyas bzhi po 'byung ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsod nams kyi tshogs med par sangs rgyas bzhi po 'byung ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not tenable that the four Buddhas arise without the accumulation of merit.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs ni bsod nams kyi bdag nyid can te /
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs ni bsod nams kyi bdag nyid can te /
translated: The family of Ratnasa·πÉbhava is the nature of merit,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the perfection of generosity is completely purified.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: de nyid mchog tu rtogs par byed //üîΩces bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid mchog tu rtogs par byed // ces bya ba gsungs so //
translated: That itself is to be realized as supreme.

original: bsod nams kyi tshogs la brten nas /
analyzed: bsod nams kyi tshogs la brten nas /
translated: In dependence on the accumulation of merit,

original: de nyid kyi mchog la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid can du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi mchog la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid can du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the realization of that very supreme reality as having the nature of the non-apprehension aspect of the perfection of wisdom.

original: yang na rigs lnga ba zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan @177b gyi rnam pa nyid do //
analyzed: yang na rigs lnga ba zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan @177b gyi rnam pa nyid do //
translated: Or else, the so-called five clans are the very aspects of Ratnasa·πÉbhava.

original: 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni sngon bzhin 'khor lo bzhi po la'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni sngon bzhin 'khor lo bzhi po la'o //
translated: Here, in the four wheels as before.

original: thams cad kyi khongs na 'dod ces bya ba ni rten yin pa'i phyir 'khor lo bzhi po rnams la yang khyab par byed pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyi khongs na 'dod ces bya ba ni rten yin pa'i phyir 'khor lo bzhi po rnams la yang khyab par byed pa'o //
translated: The desire in the totality is the pervader of the four wheels because it is the support.

original: tshor ba nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba ni tshor ba ma lus pa nye bar sdud pa'i ngo bo nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: tshor ba nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba ni tshor ba ma lus pa nye bar sdud pa'i ngo bo nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: The experience of feeling is the aspect of experience, the nature of ultimate mind of enlightenment, which is the essence of the total withdrawal of all feelings.

original: de nyid mchog tu rtogs par byed //
analyzed: de nyid mchog tu rtogs par byed //
translated: That very supreme reality is realized.

original: ces bya ba ni rgyu gnyis bzlog pa'i bdag nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rgyu gnyis bzlog pa'i bdag nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This has the meaning of the nature of the reversal of the two causes.

original: de ltar rigs lnga'i rnam par gzhag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rigs lnga'i rnam par gzhag pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the arrangement of the five clans,üîΩnow, the arrangement of the four clans is taught:

original: 'khor lo bzhi bo'i lha brjod pa'i phyir de'i yan lag tu sprul pa'i 'khor lo lha brjod pa mdor bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'khor lo bzhi bo'i lha brjod pa'i phyir de'i yan lag tu sprul pa'i 'khor lo lha brjod pa mdor bstan pa'i phyir /

original: sprul pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sprul pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúThe emanation wheel, etc. ‚Äù

original: las kyi rigs las skyes zhes bya ba ni don yod grub pa'i rigs can te /
analyzed: las kyi rigs las skyes zhes bya ba ni don yod grub pa'i rigs can te /
translated: ‚ÄúBorn from the karma family‚Äù means having the nature of Amoghasiddhi,

original: bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi mtshan nyid can las kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi mtshan nyid can las kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because of the nature of karma, which has the characteristic of the object to be accomplished and the means of accomplishment.

original: lha mo zhes bya ba ni 'chad bzhin pa rnams so //
analyzed: lha mo zhes bya ba ni 'chad bzhin pa rnams so //
translated: ‚ÄúGoddesses‚Äù are those being explained.

original: 'di dag gnas zhes bya ba ni rigs pa 'dis ni de ma thag par bshad par bya ba rnams so //
analyzed: 'di dag gnas zhes bya ba ni rigs pa 'dis ni de ma thag par bshad par bya ba rnams so //
translated: ‚ÄúThese are the places‚Äù means that by this reasoning, those to be explained immediately after.

original: rig ma gtum mo dpa' bo dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rig ma gtum mo dpa' bo dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe knowledge-woman Ca·πá·∏çƒÅlƒ´, the hero, etc. ‚Äù

original: 'di rnams la yang ye shes kyi me'i ngo bo nyid kyis ji ltar srid par don brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams la yang ye shes kyi me'i ngo bo nyid kyis ji ltar srid par don brjod par bya'o //
translated: Here also, the meaning should be stated as much as possible by the nature of the fire of knowledge.

original: lhag ma rnams ni mdo ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni mdo ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: The rest is according to the s≈´tra.

original: de ltar mdor bstan pa bshad nas ;
analyzed: de ltar mdor bstan pa bshad nas ;
translated: Having explained the brief indication,üîΩnow, in order to explain the extensive indication, he says, ‚ÄúThe emanation wheel, etc. ‚Äù

original: da ni rgyas par bstan ba bshad pa'i phyir /üîΩrtag tu brgyad spel ba'i grangs //
analyzed: da ni rgyas par bstan ba bshad pa'i phyir / rtag tu brgyad spel ba'i grangs //
translated: Now, in order to explain the extensive teaching,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚ÄúAlways increasing the eight.üîΩ‚Äù

original: lha mo drug cu rtsa bzhi'i dbye bas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lha mo drug cu rtsa bzhi'i dbye bas zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: de ltar rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rgyas par bshad pa bstan nas /

analyzed: da ni zhal dang phyag la sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain the arrangement of faces, arms, and so forth,üîΩ[the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚ÄúThree faces, six arms, blazing,

analyzed: zhal gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

original: lus ngag yid gsum rnam par dag pas so //
analyzed: lus ngag yid gsum rnam par dag pas so //
translated: [It is] ‚Äúthree faces‚Äù because of the purity of body, speech, and mind.

analyzed: phyag drug gis ni 'bar zhes bya ba ni yan lag drug gi rnam par dag pas so // rigs kyi phyag rgya'i dbye ba yis //
translated: ‚ÄúBlazing with six arms‚Äù is because of the purity of the six branches.

original: zhes bya ba ni rang gi bdag po'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i dbye bas kha dog lnga'i rang bzhin gyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang gi bdag po'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i dbye bas kha dog lnga'i rang bzhin gyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy the division of the family seals‚Äù is because of the division of the family seals of one‚Äôs lord, which are of the nature of the five colors.

analyzed: phyag mtshan rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni phyag mtshan rnams kyi'o //

analyzed: de ma thag par gsungs pa'i tshor ba la sogs pa'i lha rnams ni'o //

are on the left.

analyzed: pa 'gying pa autpala // zhes bya ba ni 'gyid pa'i autpala'o //

analyzed: g-yas na 'khor lo rin chen dang // zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i g-yas pa na'o //

analyzed: de bzhin ral gri chos 'byung ni // g-yon gyi phyag gnyis pa na 'gyur //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la g-yon gyi phyag gnyis la'o //

original: 'gyur zhes bya ba ni yod pa'o //
analyzed: 'gyur zhes bya ba ni yod pa'o //

analyzed: srid pa gsum yongs su shes pas so //
translated: The purity of the fifth is due to the nature of the body of the Buddha, which is the basis of the adornment of the major and minor marks, and which is the cause of the vision of the Buddha by sentient beings.üîΩThe purity of the sixth is due to the nature of the body of the Buddha, which is the basis of the adornment of the major and minor marks, and which is the cause of the vision of the Buddha by sentient beings.üîΩThe purity of the seventh is due to the nature of the body of the Buddha, which is the basis of the adornment of the major and minor marks, and which is the cause of the vision of the Buddha by sentient beings.üîΩThe purity of the eighth is due to the nature of the body of the Buddha, which is the basis of the adornment of the major and minor marks, and which is the cause of the vision of the Buddha by sentient beings.üîΩThe purity of the ninth is due to the nature of the body of the Buddha, which is the basis of the adornment of the major and minor marks, and which is the cause of the vision of the Buddha by sentient beings.üîΩThe purity of the tenth is due to the nature of the body of the Buddha, which is the basis of the adornment of the major and minor marks, and which is the cause of the vision of the Buddha by sentient beings.üîΩThe purity of the eleventh is due to the nature of the body of the Buddha, which is the basis of

original: zhal ni ljang gu zhes bya ba ni don yod grub pa'i rigs nyid kyi phyir ro //üîΩdon yod grub pas cod pan can //
analyzed: zhal ni ljang gu zhes bya ba ni don yod grub pa'i rigs nyid kyi phyir ro // don yod grub pas cod pan can //
translated: The green face is because of the Amoghasiddhi lineage.

original: zhes bya ba ni rang gi rigs nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang gi rigs nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The crown is because of the Amoghasiddhi lineage.

original: bsgom par bya ba ni yi ge drug cu rtsa bzhi yongs su gyur pa las bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgom par bya ba ni yi ge drug cu rtsa bzhi yongs su gyur pa las bsgom par bya ba'o //
translated: The meditation is the meditation on the transformation of the sixty-four letters.

original: zhal rnams bzhad pa zhes bya ba ni nye bar zhi ba'i ngo bo gcig pa'i phyir dang / kun rdzob kyi chos la rnam par blta bar ngo mtshar ba dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //üîΩbde ba thams cad 'phel bar mdzad //
analyzed: zhal rnams bzhad pa zhes bya ba ni nye bar zhi ba'i ngo bo gcig pa'i phyir dang / kun rdzob kyi chos la rnam par blta bar ngo mtshar ba dang bcas pa'i phyir ro // bde ba thams cad 'phel bar mdzad //
translated: The smiling faces are because of the single nature of peace, and because of the wonder of the conventional reality.

original: ces bya ba ni bde ba chen po la dga' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni bde ba chen po la dga' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The increase of all bliss is because of the delight in great bliss.

original: de ltar zhal dang phyag la sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar zhal dang phyag la sogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa bstan nas /

original: da ni sngags btu ba'i sgo nas mchod pa bya ba nyid bshad pa ni /
analyzed: da ni sngags btu ba'i sgo nas mchod pa bya ba nyid bshad pa ni /
translated: now, in order to explain the worship by means of the mantra extraction,üîΩhe says,

original: rang gi ming gi dbye ba yis //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rang gi ming gi dbye ba yis //üîΩzhes bya ba gsungs te /

original: rang gi ming gi be dha ni rang tsandi ka la sogs pa'i ngo bos so //üîΩyi ge gsum dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rang gi ming gi be dha ni rang tsandi ka la sogs pa'i ngo bos so // yi ge gsum dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: By the nature of one's own name, bedha, and by the nature of Candali, etc.

original: aom a'a:h'um gi yi ge'i bdag nyid can gyis so //
analyzed: aom a'a:h'um gi yi ge'i bdag nyid can gyis so //
translated: With the three syllables means with the nature of the syllables Om, Ah, and Hum.

original: rnam par spel zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang bar dang tha ma rnams su'o //
analyzed: rnam par spel zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang bar dang tha ma rnams su'o //
translated: Repeated means at the beginning, middle, and end.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: aom bedha ni a'a:h'um zhes bya ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //üîΩsngags kyis kyang ni yang dag mchod //
analyzed: aom bedha ni a'a:h'um zhes bya ba la sogs par 'gyur ro // sngags kyis kyang ni yang dag mchod //

original: ces bya ba ni de ma thag par btus pas so //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni de ma thag par btus pas so //
translated: One should also worship with the mantra means with the immediately following collection.

original: yang dag par zhes bya ba ni zhen pa med pa'i sbyor @178b bas so / mchod ces bya ba ni brjod par bya'o //üîΩ'dod pa de nyid rab gsal mdzad //
analyzed: yang dag par zhes bya ba ni zhen pa med pa'i sbyor @178b bas so / mchod ces bya ba ni brjod par bya'o // 'dod pa de nyid rab gsal mdzad //
translated: Correctly means with non-attached application. Worship means one should express.

translated: That very desire is made clear means that reality, which has the characteristic of the Buddha, is with the characteristic of the enjoyment of desire, such as form, etc.

original: rab gsal mdzad ces bya ba ni skyed par byed par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: rab gsal mdzad ces bya ba ni skyed par byed par mdzad pa'o //
translated: The one called ‚Äúthe illuminator‚Äù is the one who creates.

original: de ltar don rnam pa bzhis sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i lha rnams bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar don rnam pa bzhis sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i lha rnams bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the emanation wheel deities through four topics,

original: da ni chos kyi 'khor lo'i lha rnams brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni chos kyi 'khor lo'i lha rnams brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain the Dharma wheel deities,

original: de'i yan lag mdor bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de'i yan lag mdor bstan pa ni /
translated: he teaches their summary:

original: chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: ‚Äúthe Dharma wheel‚Äù and so on.

original: snying ga'i gnas su'o //
analyzed: snying ga'i gnas su'o //
translated: In the heart center.

original: rtsa brgyad dbus zhes bya ba ni brgya rtsa brgyad po rnams ni rin po che la sogs pa rnams kyi nang du'o //
analyzed: rtsa brgyad dbus zhes bya ba ni brgya rtsa brgyad po rnams ni rin po che la sogs pa rnams kyi nang du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the middle of the eight channels‚Äù means that the eighty are in the middle of the jewel and so on.

original: lha mo 'di dag ces bya ba ni 'chad bzhin pa'i rigs pas so //

analyzed: de'i phyir gang gis zhes bya ba gsungs te /

analyzed: yang dag shes pa'i zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i ngo bos so //
translated: By the knowledge of reality, etc.üîΩThe supreme state of Vajrasattva

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang mchog / ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa drug pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang mchog / ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa drug pa'i ngo bo'o //

original: de ltar de'i rtsom pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar de'i rtsom pa bstan nas /

original: da ni de'i dngos grub bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir de'i yan lag gi rten du gyur pa'i mtshams kyi bzhi po la dga' ba bzhi po rnam par gzhan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: da ni de'i dngos grub bshad pa brjod pa'i phyir de'i yan lag gi rten du gyur pa'i mtshams kyi bzhi po la dga' ba bzhi po rnam par gzhan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Now, in order to explain its spiritual powers, in order to serve as the basis for that, the four junctures are the four joys.

original: 'khor lo drug gi rtsa padma //üîΩzhes gsungs te /
analyzed: 'khor lo drug gi rtsa padma // zhes gsungs te /

original: @183b sprul pa dang / chos dang / longs spyod dang / rlung dang / bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi rtsa'i rang bzhin gyi padma drug po rnams la'o //
analyzed: @183b sprul pa dang / chos dang / longs spyod dang / rlung dang / bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi rtsa'i rang bzhin gyi padma drug po rnams la'o //
translated: The six lotuses of the nature of the channels, which have the characteristics of the emanation, enjoyment, and great bliss wheels, and the wind and bliss wheels.
